statements: UPDATE audit_logs SET activity_type = 'Login' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE account_activity_log SET amount=amount+1000.50, timestamp='2022-03-15 14:30:00' WHERE account_id=456 AND transaction_type='deposit';
